about_the_game:
Occult Chambers is a single player narrative game that immerses players in the eerie
and mysterious valleys of the Himalayas. The game delves into the darker side of Indian mythology, exploring the horror elements of ancient occult rituals and the fantastical creatures

　

Dhruv has always been sceptical of the mythological stories he grew up listening to.
However, when his father suddenly disappears and allegations surface that he has killed
an entire village and performed bizarre occult rituals, Dhruv is forced to confront the
possibility that these stories may be true. He sets out on a quest to find his father and
uncover the truth. In this journey, he finds himself in abandoned forts and chambers
filled with dark and terrifying occult activities. As he draws deeper into the mysteries
of these ancient rituals, his own beliefs are put to the test as he fights to uncover the
truth about his father and the world he thought he knew.




Occult Chambers has challenging puzzles, spell-casting, and battles with mythical creatures. The game features unique combat with ancient weapons rather than modern firearms, adding an extra layer of immersion to the journey.

Spell casting

Mastering the art of spell-casting, memorizing incantations, and successfully casting spells is a crucial gameplay mechanic in the game.
　
　

Puzzles

Occult Chambers features unique and one-of-a-kind puzzle designs, with a wide variety of environmental puzzles inspired by mystical themes and ritualistic mechanics.
　
　

Combat

Experience intense battles against fantastical creatures using a variety of ancient, primitive melee weapons and ranged weapons. The combat system emphasizes strategy and skill, as players must use both their weapons and their mastery of spell-casting to defeat their enemies.

content_descriptors.notes: General Mature Content - Experience intense battles against fantastical creatures as we fight

name: Occult Chambers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 6700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 with 6GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Ti with 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Playing on minimum requirements should enable to play on Low/Medium quality settings in FullHD (1080p) in stable 30 FPS in performance mode. SSD Required. The above specifications were tested with DLSS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500 ／ Intel Core i7 9700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT with 8 GB VRAM／ NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 with 8 GB VRAM / INTEL Arc A750 with 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Playing on recommended requirements should enable to play on Medium quality settings in 60 FPS in Performance mode or High quality settings in 30 FPS, in FullHD. SSD Required. The above specifications were tested with DLSS.

short_description: Occult Chambers is a third-person action-horror game set in the India, where players follow protagonist Dhruv on his quest to find his missing father. Along the way, he uncovers a sinister world of occult rituals and fantastical creatures from deep Indian mythology.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
